get.summary: Returns the transcript of the episode.
get.description: Wihtout limit and offset, you get the whole transcript.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many entries should be delivered?

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: From which entry should the data be delivered?

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many entries are there? Ignored limit and offset.
